movie.title: A Fish Called Wanda
movie.writer: John Cleese (story), Charles Crichton (story), John Cleese
movie.actors: John Cleese, Jamie Lee Curtis, Kevin Kline, Michael Palin
movie.plot: Sexy American diamonds lover Wanda and her boyfriend Otto are in England to plot alongside George and Ken the robbery of a diamond collection. Wanda and Otto want the stolen diamonds for themselves, and inform the police about George not knowing that he has already moved the diamonds to another secret place. Wanda thinks the best way to find out is by getting close to George's lawyer - Archie Leach.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Smartly written, smoothly directed, and solidly cast, A Fish Called Wanda offers a classic example of a brainy comedy with widespread appeal.
